message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth more than $100 to me. I'm looking to sell it for $150 in this first round. Please let me know if this price works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $80 at this time. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $95 in this round. Please let me know if this price works for you or if you would like to make another counteroffer.
